entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 30 %
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
